about_the_game:
●Story


After many years of working in society, I can now live a decent life, but I don't have any goals in life, I just go to work and leave work every day! One day, drunk, I shouted to the sky that I wanted a girlfriend, and a beautiful girl appeared.

"I'm still a low-level succubus, so I can't do what you think, and I haven't even managed to seduce humans yet ......."

Lilim, a self-proclaimed succubus, said there was only one way to get stronger as a succubus and that was to have sex!
Having been single for a long time and feeling lonely, I agreed to take her in for a month, which made Lilim very happy, and watching her smile made me feel a little itchy inside and, well, admittedly, a little itchy in the lower half of my body too.I can't wait to see what kind of colourful life we'll have.

What will happen to my relationship with Lilim during these 30 days, and will she be able to fulfil her dream of becoming a High Succubus?

●Gameplay


A relaxed daily management system where you go to work to earn money, go on weekend dates and interact with Lilim in a limited number of daily actions.
You must keep an eye on Lilim's 【Satisfaction Level】, feed her before she gets hungry, and collect sperm to increase her 【Succubus Level】. Lilim's 【Affection】 and 【Lasciviousness】 will increase during the exchange, and Lilim will react differently depending on your level, which will also affect the direction of the ending.

After reaching certain endings, you will be able to continue interacting with Lilim after 30 days.

◆Game Features


◇Fully animated full motion H-scene.
◇Multiple costumes, you can dress Lilim according to your preferences.
◇Lilim has different reactions and dialogues depending on the value.
◇Multiple endings

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

detailed_description:
●Story


After many years of working in society, I can now live a decent life, but I don't have any goals in life, I just go to work and leave work every day! One day, drunk, I shouted to the sky that I wanted a girlfriend, and a beautiful girl appeared.

"I'm still a low-level succubus, so I can't do what you think, and I haven't even managed to seduce humans yet ......."

Lilim, a self-proclaimed succubus, said there was only one way to get stronger as a succubus and that was to have sex!
Having been single for a long time and feeling lonely, I agreed to take her in for a month, which made Lilim very happy, and watching her smile made me feel a little itchy inside and, well, admittedly, a little itchy in the lower half of my body too.I can't wait to see what kind of colourful life we'll have.

What will happen to my relationship with Lilim during these 30 days, and will she be able to fulfil her dream of becoming a High Succubus?

●Gameplay


A relaxed daily management system where you go to work to earn money, go on weekend dates and interact with Lilim in a limited number of daily actions.
You must keep an eye on Lilim's 【Satisfaction Level】, feed her before she gets hungry, and collect sperm to increase her 【Succubus Level】. Lilim's 【Affection】 and 【Lasciviousness】 will increase during the exchange, and Lilim will react differently depending on your level, which will also affect the direction of the ending.

After reaching certain endings, you will be able to continue interacting with Lilim after 30 days.

◆Game Features


◇Fully animated full motion H-scene.
◇Multiple costumes, you can dress Lilim according to your preferences.
◇Lilim has different reactions and dialogues depending on the value.

name: Lilim wants to Lv up♥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: One night a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room, not only dressed in cool and sexy clothes, but also with horns and a tail.The self-proclaimed succubus Lilim came to the human world to become stronger, and my hoarded sexual desire was the perfect target for her.
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
